{{Useful Function}}
<lowercasetitle/>

This function is used to determine if an element is within a pickup.

==Syntax==
<section name="Server" class="server" show="true"><syntaxhighlight lang="lua"> bool isElementWithinPickup ( element theElement, pickup thePickup ) </syntaxhighlight></section>
<section name="Client" class="client" show="true"><syntaxhighlight lang="lua"> ) </syntaxhighlight></section>

===Required Arguments===
*'''theElement:''' The [[/element.md|element]] you're checking.
*'''thePickup:''' The [[/pickup.md|pickup]] you're checking.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the element is within the pickup, ''false'' otherwise

===Code===
<section name="Function source" class="both" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function isElementWithinPickup(theElement, thePickup)
	if (isElement(theElement) and getElementType(thePickup) == "pickup") then
		local x, y, z = getElementPosition(theElement)
		local x2, y2, z2 = getElementPosition(thePickup)
		if (getDistanceBetweenPoints3D(x2, y2, z2, x, y, z) <= 1) then
			return true
		end
	end
	return false
end
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
local pickup = createPickup(...)

addCommandHandler("heal", function(source)
	if (isElementWithinPickup(source, pickup)) then
		if (getElementHealth <= 100) then
			setElementHealth(source, 100)
		end
	end
end)
</syntaxhighlight>
